title: S13 Ep25: Evil Incarnate: The Mothman Curse
itunes:title: Evil Incarnate: The Mothman Curse
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is in the presence of Evil Incarnate: The Mothman Curse with Loren Coleman!

This could be The Most Dangerous episode you ever listen to. Loren Coleman shares the hidden curse surrounding The Mothman. We discuss current sightings & mysterious deaths that surround the famed beast.

Coleman is the founder and director of the International Cryptozoology Museum in Portland, Maine www.cryptozoologymuseum.com & can be followed on Twitter at @CryptoLoren and on his blog, www.cryptozoonews.com.

GET HIS BOOK HERE: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
